error.signature: JsonPayloadError: Payload error: payload reached size limit

verdict.summary: Actix-web rejects payloads exceeding the default size limit (256KB). Increase the limit via JsonConfig.

dead_ends.why_fails: Opens the server to denial-of-service attacks via oversized payloads

workarounds.action: Configure JsonConfig with an appropriate payload size limit
Use streaming deserialization for very large payloads
workarounds.how: Use actix_web::web::Payload stream instead of Json<T> extractor for bodies > 10MB

leads_to.condition: After size limit is fixed, deserialization errors may appear

preceded_by.condition: When connection resets mask the real payload issue

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Serde errors are about type mismatches; payload errors are about request body size limits
